content: The television show "Friends" originally aired from 1994 to 2004 and featured six main characters; what were their first names?

The main characters in the television show "Friends" are Rachel Green, Monica Geller, Phoebe Buffay, Joey Tribbiani, Chandler Bing, and Ross Geller. So their first names are Rachel, Monica, Phoebe, Joey, Chandler, and Ross.
